body.p:
To add the Google reCAPTCHA widget to the Sign Up or Forgot Password forms, edit the $OXYGEN_FEEDBACK_HOME_DIR/config/recaptcha.properties file and set the following options:
google.recaptcha.enabled - Must be set to true to enable the reCAPTCHA support.
google.recaptcha.key.site - The reCAPTCHA public (site) key.
google.recaptcha.secret - The reCAPTCHA secret key. The site key and secret key values can be obtained at .
